subject: Order #SSN5702 not shipped out yet
description_text:
Hi,

I hope this email finds you well :) Just wanted to contact you regarding
Order #SSN5702 as I haven't heard any updates regarding its status.

Kind regards,
Aidan Gerada

conversations.body_text: Hi Aidan Gerada,  We sincerely apologize, but your order cannot be shipped. We will proceed to cancel your order on your behalf. Thank you for your understanding.
